Posts.Content: Sep 24, 2008 12:53PM Massgirl wrote: I moved back into our bed two weeks post, then moved back to the recliner for a night, then back to the bed, lol.  It was much better when the drains were out.  I'm 3 weeks out now and I still sleep w/two pillows under my head and one under my knees, but it's nice to at least be upstairs with the rest of my family. Best wishes!
Posts.Title: Moving Back to Bed with Hubby hostanut Massgirl
